Subjects: sermons, verse in; sin, consequences of; summoners; Doomsday; judgement day
_description: On the consequences of sin, in a Latin sermon — two couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
þe someneres byth myȝthfulþe domys
                    ryȝthfulTo wyte þe tyme we buth vnwyttyTo fle þe dome
                    we ben vn myȝthy
